channel.title: Crime_data on Bayesian Politics
channel.description: Recent content in Crime_data on Bayesian Politics

item.title: Feminicides in Latin America and the Caribbean
item.description: Context According to statistics from the Puerto Rico Police Department, reported this week in a newspaper from Puerto Rico, there’s been 21 women killed by their partners or ex-partners in 2018 in the island. [1] Feminist collectives have expressed that the total feminicide count is around 40 women. However, how do we define feminicide?

item.title: Feminicidios en Latino América y el Caribe
item.description: El blog post completo se encuentra aqui: https://www.bayesianpolitik.me/feminicidesLATAM/feminicides_es Debido a limitaciones con el software las graficas y las tablas que van adjuntas al texto solo estan disponibles en el enlace de arriba. Por favor lea el post ahi. La imagen en la parte superior es del libro de Eduardo Galeano ‘Las Venas Abiertas de América Latina’.
